reference.title: Trace : To send string to Trace window

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will format the passed parameters based on format specified and will show the formatted text in TRACE window. The return value of this function will be 0 or 1.

section.title: Returns
section.p: A value zero indicate failure condition while a value 1 indicate a success condition. This function can return 0 in case user has passed a NULL pointer. If the TRACE window is visible, it will be made visible
